thread.section_title: CORGI HomePlan Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CORGI HomePlan | corgihomeplan.co.uk | 13 of 179
thread.title: Mr Berry
thread.title_full: CORGI HomePlan reviewed by Mr Berry

author: Mr Berry
title: Mr Berry
text:
"2nd week in January we returned home from a week in Wales to our home in the Forest of Dean.
The house was absolutely freezing! I tripped the thermostat that I had previously set at 15 degrees up to a snug 20 but nothing happened.
Its 5pm on a Friday night, the forecast is for snow when I phone CORGI who after a short interrogation say that I can expect a call back from the engineer within 24 hours.
I thought that as it was Friday I would be lucky to hear anything before Monday and started to get the log burner going.
6pm telephone call from the engineer who said he would be half an hour - on the dot of 6.30 he arrived and by 7.00 pm he was gone - job done tested and working just fine.
Now thats what I paid for and am so pleased with the service I have taken the trouble to type this up. Excellent, first class in all respects.
